message: Hello Bob, I am pleased to offer you this exceptional product. Given its value and potential, I'm asking for $950,000. I believe this is a fair price reflecting its worth.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.
Bob, I understand your position, but $850,000 is significantly below my minimum.  To be fair to both of us, I could meet you halfway at $900,000. This reflects the true value of the product.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $875,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and my financial constraints.
